meta.name: keywords
meta.content: PAC-MAN Lite, Namco Networks America Inc., Games, Arcade, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes

meta.name: description
meta.content: Read reviews, get customer ratings, see screenshots, and learn more about PAC-MAN Lite on the App Store. Download PAC-MAN Lite and enjoy it on your iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch.

head.title: App Store - PAC-MAN Lite

div.span: If iTunes doesn't open, click the iTunes application icon in your Dock or on your Windows desktop.

div.h2: iTunes is the world's easiest way to organize and add to your digital media collection.

p.preview-capable-text: We are unable to find iTunes on your computer. To download the free app PAC-MAN Lite by Namco Networks America Inc., get iTunes now.

div.p: We are unable to find iTunes on your computer. To download the free app PAC-MAN Lite by Namco Networks America Inc., get iTunes now.
Already have iTunes? Click I Have iTunes to open it now.
Open iTunes to buy and download apps.

Relive this classic with PAC-MAN Lite, a FREE version of PAC-MAN’s first stage! Who can forget the countless hours and quarters spent avoiding pesky ghosts while chompin’ on dots and gobbling up the fruit for bonus points?
Guide PAC-MAN with three new control modes. Dodge pesky ghosts by tilting or rotating your iPhone in Accelerometer Mode. Navigate through the mazes by touching the onscreen Directional Pad in D-Pad Mode. Chomp on dots with the swipe of a finger in Swipe Mode.
Munch fruits and other items for big points! Gobble blinking Power Pellets to weaken ghosts temporarily and eat them up before they change back. Avoid Blinky, the leader of the ghosts, and his fellow ghosts Pinky, Inky and Clyde, or you will lose a life. Get an extra life when you reach 10,000 points!
CHECK OUT THESE OTHER COOL NAMCO GAMES:
- Pool Pro Online 3
- Isaac Newton's Gravity
- Lt. Fly
- Mr. Driller

div.a: Namco Networks America Inc. Web Site

div.p: Stupid pac-man lite! >:( I can't keep buying coins! Don't waste ur money on this. I love PAC man though.
One of the best games of all time

ul.li: Languages:English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Spanish

div.p: Requirements:Compatible with iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. Requires iOS 3.1.3 or later
